definition: plus/to put in/to add/to add on/to add into/in addition/on top of that
abbr. for Canada 加拿大[Jia1 na2 da4]/surname Jia

to add/plus/(used after an adverb such as 不, 大, 稍 etc, and before a disyllabic verb, to indicate that the action of the verb is applied to sth or sb previously mentioned)/to apply (restrictions etc) to (sb)/to give (support, consideration etc) to (sth)
on top/upon/above/upper/previous/first (of multiple parts)/to climb/to get onto/to go up/to attend (class or university)

sentences.english: Back to the room to sleep, you may have seen her with the quilt, the mother.
sentences.chinese: 回房睡觉，也许你已见她加上的被子，那个是母亲。

sentences.english: Atoms must start with a lower case character, or you can delimit with single quotes.
sentences.chinese: 原子值必须以小写字母开头，否则需要加上单引号。

sentences.english: If I were to add the word pigmy, ring a bell?
sentences.chinese: 如果我加上词，矮人，听起来熟悉吗？

sentences.english: Overly long warm-ups coupled with runs for punishment.
sentences.chinese: 过长时间的热身再加上惩罚式的跑步。

sentences.english: A silver mirror, coated with a gold-coloured protective layer.
sentences.chinese: 银色镜面涂层加上金色保护层。

sentences.english: We expect to have this re-added prior to final release.
sentences.chinese: 我们希望在最终发行之前重新加上。

sentences.english: Greeting with Iranian, you need to address their surname with their academic or job title.
sentences.chinese: 和伊朗人打招呼，要称他们的姓加上学术或职务头衔。

sentences.english: It's a honey ham with a sweet glaze.
sentences.chinese: 这是加上糖汁的蜜汁火腿。

sentences.english: Where is the best point to add the code that prohibits access to hidden pages for non-admins?
sentences.chinese: 怎么样才能更好地把阻止进入隐藏页面的代码加上？

sentences.english: The racquet face is a bit closed, so she'll generate some topspin.
sentences.chinese: 她现在的拍面是闭合的，因此她就可以加上点上旋。

sentences.english: Plus it can hose COM stuff that the original app isn't expecting.
sentences.chinese: 加上它可能会使原程序丢失一些COM信息。

sentences.english: And he laughs while he does it, he always added, scowling at his son.
sentences.chinese: 他总是加上这么一句，并对他的儿子怒目相向。

sentences.english: Of course, adding a dessert and a cup of tea or coffee is also another good choice.
sentences.chinese: 味色具佳，最好加上一道甜点，以及茶式咖啡。

sentences.english: Add to that the costs associated with a moderate involvement with those newly prioritized activities that you truly love.
sentences.chinese: 然后加上适量参加重新排选过你所热爱的活动的费用。

sentences.english: Packet encryption also allows packets to be time-stamped.
sentences.chinese: 包加密也允许包被加上时间标记。

sentences.english: Fried mutton fat with onions goes well with vodka.
sentences.chinese: 油炸肥羊肉伴洋葱，再加上一杯伏特加就是绝配了。

definition: of/~'s (possessive particle)/(used after an attribute)/(used to form a nominal expression)/(used at the end of a declarative sentence for emphasis)
due to/as a result of/thanks to/owing to/since/because
abbr. for Canada 加拿大[Jia1 na2 da4]/surname Jia

to add/plus/(used after an adverb such as 不, 大, 稍 etc, and before a disyllabic verb, to indicate that the action of the verb is applied to sth or sb previously mentioned)/to apply (restrictions etc) to (sb)/to give (support, consideration etc) to (sth)
to combine a powdery substance (flour, plaster etc) with water/Taiwan pr. [huo4]
to compose a poem in reply (to sb's poem) using the same rhyme sequence/to join in the singing/to chime in with others
to mix (ingredients) together/to blend/classifier for rinses of clothes/classifier for boilings of medicinal herbs
to complete a set in mahjong or playing cards
and/together with/with/sum/union/peace/harmony/Taiwan pr. [han4] when it means "and" or "with"
and/as well as/and so/but (not)/yet (not)/(indicates causal relation)/(indicates change of state)/(indicates contrast)
also/too/(in Classical Chinese) final particle implying affirmation
